T01n824u_001:3: tatsarvaṃ hara me nātha rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka || 1 ||
T01n824u_001:10: saṃsāre vyāpito'haṃ tu kathaṃ pāraṃ prayāsyate |
T01n824u_001:11: tvameva śaraṇaṃ tatra rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka || 5 ||
T01n824u_001:14: sadā kṛpāmayastvaṃ hi sadā rakṣāmayo'si ca |
T01n824u_001:15: sadā prajñāmayastvaṃ hi rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka || 7 ||
T01n824u_001:16: yena yena kṛtaṃ karma tena tenaiva dhāritam |
T01n824u_001:23: vandanīyaḥ sadā tvaṃ hi rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka || 11 ||
T01n824u_001:24: bharti vā bhartiko vāpi mitraṃ vā śatruko'pi vā |
T01n824u_001:25: sarvatra ca dayāyukto rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka || 12 ||
T01n824u_001:27: tvāṃ namāmi punarbhūyo rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka || 13 ||
T01n824u_001:29: dayasva cāvalokeśa mocayasva ca māṃ kṣaṇāt || 14 ||
T01n824u_001:31: astu te karuṇā mahyaṃ bhaktiṃ caivācalāṃ kuru || 15 ||
